ai-mil6.3.8:1.1_0: “Reverend Sir, when anyone practices rightly, all things do not come to anyone at all in anyone.”
ai-mil6.3.8:1.2_0: “Whoever is there no one who doesn’t belong to anyone?”
ai-mil6.3.8:1.4_0: “Great king, when a person has entered inside a house, there is no penetration of the teachings. ...
ai-mil6.3.8:1.4_5: with a murderer of a perfected one,
ai-mil6.3.8:1.4_6: with one who has caused a schism in the Sangha ...
ai-mil6.3.8:1.4_7: with one who has caused the Buddha to bleed,
ai-mil6.3.8:1.4_8: one living in the community by theft,
ai-mil6.3.8:1.4_9: with one who has previously left to join the ascetics of another religion,
ai-mil6.3.8:1.4_10: with one who has raped a nun,
ai-mil6.3.8:1.4_13: or practice in accordance with the Teaching;
ai-mil6.3.8:1.4_14: Even when a human being is taking a trader for provisions in the teaching,
ai-mil6.3.8:1.5_0: “Great king, these six things aren’t proper for a person to transgress in this way.”
ai-mil6.3.8:2.1_0: “Venerable Sir, when it is finished, of these individuals—perfected by a magician or running all the people in the various orders of gods, human beings, humans, demons, dragons, and fame in the cul-de-sac—nowhere pronouncing the immate cause of preventing the teachings.
ai-mil6.3.8:2.2_0: For such a question is one who isn’t young, hateful, or delusion. They’re not afflicted with greed, hate, delusional, or has wrong view. And they’re not able to realize the four kinds of sensual stimulation.”
ai-mil6.3.8:3.1_0: “Great king, there are some reason why I practice the label ‘perception-of-worker’s practice, which ends and comprehends the minds of others.
ai-mil6.3.8:3.2_0: ‘Great king, if arouses the dye overpower, you’d obstinately stick to yourselves, you’d loving being poorly dreadful and excited, deluded, oppressed, and unskilled in views, their mind would contempt, darkness, deluded, and unskillful thoughts.
ai-mil6.3.8:3.3_0: For he who is very weak and complexion with his mind free from the great king embankments for himself when he is able to lose his weakness. Instead of focusing on the greatness of reflection.
ai-mil6.3.8:4.1_0: “Great king, Sineru, the king of mountains, would that man be able to pull out his own king’s power?”
ai-mil6.3.8:4.5_0: “In the same way, great king, his mind is weak, unrestrained, unrealized, and unrealized. It’s limited, unrealized, and unconditioned. It’s limited, quarrels, and fathoms.
ai-mil6.3.8:4.6_0: he is unable to quell up with a great weak mind on the other side of less than heat, without disputing, with short of hating and feeding on scraps. He is unable to penetrate arrow through the enlightenment of the elements.
ai-mil6.3.8:5.1_0: And that great king Dīgha Kārāyana Virūpakkha ponds, Virūḷhaka to the assembly hall with a large wide opened. Would that small fire to break into it?”
ai-mil6.3.8:5.4_0: “Sir, forty water are cut off by the great earth.”
ai-mil6.3.8:5.5_0: “In the same way, great king, his mind is weak, unrestrained, unrealized, and uncomprehended. It’s limited, unreal, real, not quiet, shake and rocky.
ai-mil6.3.8:5.6_0: he is unable to quell up with a great weakness through that safeguard. He is unable to penetrate the level of the elements that conformity with a (wholesome) continually lacking penetration. He is unable to penetrate it.
ai-mil6.3.8:6.1_0: Or if it is possible, great king, without arrogant enough for you to show the thought of conqueror even with the dreams, would the hymns still discuss?”
ai-mil6.3.8:6.4_0: “Sir, the fire in the world is because of the greatest.”
ai-mil6.3.8:6.5_0: “In the same way, great king, a mind that’s uncleared, full of weakness and unrestrained, without weakness, and without hate and delusion.
ai-mil6.3.8:6.6_0: So hard to give to knowledge, he is not able to show the prohibiting each and everything over to the point of true knowledge.
ai-mil6.3.8:7.1_0: Or if it is possible, great king, that the elephant-trough harpol is not able to mount a bull elephant’s ear, it wouldn’t be able to get to meet the elephant that rolled around it with its eight treasures.”
ai-mil6.3.8:7.4_0: “Sir, the large elephant strings were very large.”
ai-mil6.3.8:7.5_0: “In the same way, great king, the mind is weak, unrestrained, unrealized, and unconditioned. It’s limited, unrealized, and uncomprehended.
ai-mil6.3.8:7.6_0: and it is not able to penetrate a small area of the hymns that are dubious and undistorted. That is, penetrate a large consequence of reason for repairing the teachings, and in order to penetrate it.”
ai-mil6.3.8:7.7_0: “Good, sir, would you agree with such a dragon?”
